mapper.select: SELECT boardnum, id, title, TO_CHAR(inputdate,'yy/mm/dd') as inputdate, hits FROM jsp6board ORDER BY boardnum DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r, ot.boardnum boardnum, ot.id id, ot.title title, ot.content content, ot.inputdate inputdate, ot.hits hits FROM (SELECT boardnum, id, title, content, inputdate, hits FROM jsp6board ORDER BY inputdate DESC) ot ) WHERE r BETWEEN (#{value} * 10) - 9 AND #{value} * 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jsp6board (boardnum, id, title, content) VALUES (jsp6board_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{content})
